summary: Completed comprehensive SEO testing for TopTube World Pro. All SEO implementations are working correctly - meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter cards, canonical URLs, and JSON-LD structured data are properly configured on all page types.

design_issues.issue: React hydration warnings for HTML table nesting - span elements as children of tr/tbody (known issue from iteration 1)
